metadata.title: Projects
metadata.description: A summary of projects I've worked on.

section.description: Below is a summary of public projects I've worked on.

projects.title: Communication and Multimedia's Student Group Website
projects.details: I spearheaded the development of a new website for the student group as the head of the department. You can access it here. I utilized Vue, Tailwind, and Laravel. Working alongside two contributors, I led by teaching them Git and GitHub, conducting regular check-ins to ensure the project stayed on track, and assigning tasks effectively.

projects.title: Unfinished Pokémon Instagram Clone
projects.details: I started a project to clone Instagram using PokéAPI. I used Next.js to create the frontend and connected it to the API to fetch Pokémon data. I didn't finish the project, but you can see the demo here.
